loc: Kota Waisai, Kabupaten Raja Ampat, Papua Barat

rmk: Calling from 2200 after heavy rain post-dusk. From elevated perch on edge of lush garden; easily spotlit on branch c15 feet up. Totally unaffected by torch light and continued singing throughout; still going strong and easy to see at dawn next morning. My easiest pitta ever!
